TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBar/ToolBarButtonCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装一个 控件的集合，供 类使用。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of controls for use by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由类使用的从零开始的索引集合, 用于保存分配给工具栏的所有控件。 The is a zero-based indexed collection used by the class to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 使用方法可添加各个按钮 , 并使用方法来删除它们。 Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete them. 调用方法可从集合中移除所有按钮。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个和三个控件。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具栏按钮将分配给工具栏, 工具栏将添加到窗体中。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此代码需要已创建的。This code requires that a has already been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会创建并显式调用其构造函数。You do not typically create a and explicitly call its constructor. 通过引用 控件的属性, 创建了 。By referencing the property of the control, a is created. 然后, 你可以访问其属性和方法, 然后将控件分配给集合。You can then gain access to its properties and methods, and assign controls to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含分配给集合的控件的实际数量。 The property holds the actual number of controls assigned to the collection. 通常使用属性值作为循环的上限来循环访问集合。It is common to use the property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 集合的索引值是从零开始的索引, 因此必须从循环变量中减去一个, 否则会超出集合的上限并引发异常。The index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable otherwise you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 在调用方法之前和之后的。The following code example displays the of the before and after the method is called. 此代码要求创建至少具有一个的。This code requires that a with at least one has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将控件分配到特定位置, 或从中检索它们, 可以引用具有特定索引值的集合对象。To assign controls to a specific location, or to retrieve them from the , you can reference the collection object with a specific index value. 的索引值是从零开始的索引。The index value of the is a zero-based index. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将替换工具栏上的最后一个工具栏按钮。The following code example replaces the last toolbar button on a toolbar. 此代码要求 至少创建一个。This code requires that a and at least one have been created. 该示例获取工具栏上的按钮数, 并将最后一个按钮替换为新创建的按钮。The example gets the number of buttons on the toolbar and replaces the last button with a newly created one. 因为`index` 集合是从零开始的索引, 所以被替换的工具栏按钮的值被设置为减一。The `index` value of the toolbar button being replaced is set to the property, minus one, since the collection is a zero-based index. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除 中指定位置的。 The method removes the at the specified location in the . 如果要删除集合中的所有控件, 请使用方法。If you want to remove all controls from the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例移除中的最后一个。The following code example removes the last on a . 由于集合是从零开始的索引, 因此要移除的工具栏按钮的索引值被设置为等于属性减一。 The index value of the toolbar button being removed is set equal to the property, minus one, since the collection is a zero-based index.
